about_the_game:
Play the famous pirate BLACK BEARD in this new generation Endless Runner with stunning photo-realistic graphics! Blizzard, sandstorm or torrential rain, try to survive as long as possible!

Run, swing, avoid hordes of zombies in the middle of the desert by playing the famous pirate BLACKBEARD while marveling at hypnotic but dangerous scenery ! Try to survive by crossing a canyon infested with zombies or the diabolical mountains of Kilimanjaro, avoid dead trees and avalanches of stones in YellowStone park. This Endless Runner offers 4 different maps:

*Temple of Sun
*Mount Kilimanjaro
*Utah' Canyon (zombie mode)
*Yellowstone

Try to beat your own distance and gold coins records...

Crédits:
Main theme Music: Cyber war
Tack Artist: AlexiAction

name: Pirate Runner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) or Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K / Core™ i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580 - DirectX 12.0 compatible system
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
